
First submission

```{r}
# Full model
m.formula <- wis ~
  # Method
  s(Method, bs = "re") +
  # Number of target countries
  s(CountryTargets, bs = "re") +
  # -----------------------------
  # Trend
  s(Trend, bs = "re") +
  # Location
  s(location, bs = "re") +
  # Weekly by location
  s(time, by = location, k = 40) +
  # Horizon
  s(Horizon, k = 3, by = Model, bs = "sz") +
  # Individual model
  s(Model, bs = "re")
```

First revision, response to reviewer comments
```{r}
# Full model
m.formula <- wis ~
  # Method
  s(Method, bs = "re") +
  # Number of target countries
  s(CountryTargets, bs = "re") +
  # -----------------------------
  # Trend
  s(Trend, bs = "re") +
  # Variant phase
  s(VariantPhase, bs = "re") +
  # Location
  s(location, bs = "re") +
  # Horizon
  s(Horizon, k = 3, by = Model, bs = "sz") +
  # Individual model
  s(Model, bs = "re")
```
